fr.uv1.bettingServices.player

Class Player

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.uv1.bettingServices.player.Player

  • public class Player
extends java.lang.Object
    Classe Player
    This class declares all attributes and methods that should be provided by a player.
    Author:
    debbabi, asamimoh

      • changeSubsPwd

        public boolean changeSubsPwd(java.lang.String newPwd,
                             java.lang.String currentPwd)
                      throws fr.uv1.bettingServices.exceptions.AuthenticationException,
                             fr.uv1.bettingServices.exceptions.BadParametersException
        changes current user password
        Parameters:
        newPwd - new user password
        currentPwd - current user password
        Throws:
        fr.uv1.bettingServices.exceptions.AuthenticationException - raised if the player's password and the new password passed as a parameters are not equals.
        fr.uv1.bettingServices.exceptions.BadParametersException - raised if the current password or the new password is null.

      • authentificatePlayer

        public boolean authentificatePlayer(java.lang.String userNameEntered,
                                    java.lang.String pwdPlayerEntered)
                             throws fr.uv1.bettingServices.exceptions.AuthenticationException,
                                    fr.uv1.bettingServices.exceptions.BadParametersException
        Checks if the entered userName and password are correct for a player
        Parameters:
        userNameEntered -
        pwdPlayerEntered -
        Returns:

        true if player has the same userName and password

        false if userName and password does not match with the player
        Throws:
        fr.uv1.bettingServices.exceptions.AuthenticationException - raised if the player's userName and the password passed as a parameters does not match.
        fr.uv1.bettingServices.exceptions.BadParametersException - raised if the userName or the password is null.

      • creditSubscriber

        public long creditSubscriber(long numberTokens)
                      throws fr.uv1.bettingServices.exceptions.BadParametersException
        credit number of tokens of a subscriber.
        Parameters:
        numberTokens - number of tokens to credit.
        Returns:
        nbTokens the new value of the player's credit.
        Throws:
        fr.uv1.bettingServices.exceptions.BadParametersException - raised if number of tokens is less than (or equals to) 0.

      • debitSubscriber

        public long debitSubscriber(long numberTokens)
                     throws fr.uv1.bettingServices.exceptions.SubscriberException,
                            fr.uv1.bettingServices.exceptions.BadParametersException
        debit a subscriber account with a number of tokens.
        Parameters:
        numberTokens - number of tokens to debit.
        Returns:
        nbTokens the new value of the player's credit
        Throws:
        fr.uv1.bettingServices.exceptions.SubscriberException - raised if number of tokens not enough.
        fr.uv1.bettingServices.exceptions.BadParametersException - raised if number of tokens is less than (or equals to) 0.

      • infosSubscriber

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> infosSubscriber()
        consult informations about a subscriber
        Returns:
        list of String with:
        • subscriber's lastname
        • subscriber's firstname
        • subscriber's borndate
        • subscriber's username
        • number of tokens
